== Intro ==

in the name of Allah the merciful the compassionate .

Praise be to Allah, Who taught by the pen, Taught man that which he knew not, and prayers and peace be upon the Seal of the Prophets and all the prophets and messengers.

We Salute you with salutation of islam , Peace, mercy and blessings of Allah

This home page of the Saudi team local - for distribution Ubuntu / Linux. Aim is Allah's will in this page on extension and distribution of information relating to distribution and ubuntu by working Caffreq local calls to use the distribution and development direction of the operating system GNU / Linux free a open source to get the advantages of advanced and beneficial to society and the individual, and thus show the ease of use of the system in general and local. Our aim is to raise the hand of the Arabization of documents available in languages other than Arabic. Yet we are at present building our team & inviting other loco people to join.

The Saudi Arabia Team , salutation

Or You can access it through the web interface <nowiki>[[http://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=ubuntu-sa|#ubuntu-sa]]</nowiki>

Keeping in touch with other members is important, it's Team-work remember :).
== How To Contribute To The Team ==
* You Can help <nowiki>[[http://spreadubuntu.org | Spread]]</nowiki> the word " Ubuntu / Linux " in your local Community @ home - work - school - University.
* You can invite other people to join the team.
* You can help <nowiki>[[https://translations.launchpad.net | Translate]]</nowiki> Application or documents , <nowiki>[[https://answers.launchpad.net/ | Answering Questions]]</nowiki> , and  <nowiki>[[https://answers.launchpad.net/ | Reporting Bugs]]</nowiki>.
* if you're a programmer you can help <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/sabily-project | the Sabily team]]</nowiki> Improving Their Fabulous Distro,the Ubuntu "Muslim Edition".
* Designing Logos & Icons.
* Join the team <nowiki>[[http://groups.google.com/group/ubuntu-sa|Mailing List]]</nowiki> , <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-sa|Launchpad team]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=ubuntu-sa|IRC channel]]</nowiki>.
* Collaborate in the <nowiki>[[SaudiTeam-English-Events|Team events]]</nowiki>.
* Collaborate in the <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/forumdisplay.php?f=264|Team Forum]]</nowiki>
* Submit ideas to the mailing list.
* Share successful stories about your Ubuntu experience.

== Launchpad Membership Policy ==
Everyone who lives in Saudi Arabia and uses Ubuntu and wishes to help and provide support to other Ubuntu users can join the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-sa|Launchpad ubuntu-sa team]]</nowiki>.
